review: We went there for dinner on Tuesday around 8pm. The restaurant was very quiet, only few other people. The ambiance of the restaurant & sitting areas are nice. It was a cold evening, so didn‚Äôt go to the terrace. There was DJ & music was ‚Ä¶
name: Sarmin Shahariath

review:
Great view but cocktails were terrible.
Intercontinental do something about this. Kiev has so many talented cocktail alchimists. ‚Ä¶
name: H. Thabet

review:
11th floor bar and bar food available after 6pm with outdoor seating (with blanket if required) with good views of Kiev.
Wonderfully laid out, a must visit when in Kiev and see the signature signed glasses of the famous displayed.
name: Anthony Manmohan

review:
Great rooftop place in the heart of Kyiv at the top floor of Intercontinental Hotel.
Tasty food and amazing cocktails (alcohol free as well) ‚Ä¶
name: Yaroslav Kerget

review: Very nice asian food and sushi, lovely cocktails and virgin cocktails. Stunning view! Wine and food are a bit pricey though.
name: Nina Groll

review: Nice classic place. They have wine glasses signed by famous people. You can get shisha out of fruit. We had üçç. Nice views.
name: Matthew Jacobi

review:
Really nice place here! One of the best view i saw in kiev! Atmosphere so nice to relax and have a dinner! I enjoyed so much!!
the guys that work here are very professional and helpful!  I felt good at all times!  thank you very much, keep it up!  We will see us again for sure!!
name: Marco Guti√©rrez Nini

review: The view is very nice the place is very classy and elegant but the food is not so good all the drinks are generic drinks the prices are extremely high for food that isn't worth it
name: Ray Tan

review: Really good view but the beer selection was limited and the drinks fairly expensive for the city standard. Good service from the staff
name: Michael Lam

review: Breathtaking views. A bit pricey for Kiev but definitely worth it! One of the best cocktail place we've been to in Kiev.
name: Karolis Kajƒónas

review: Great place to chill out. Good service and nice view.
name: Mohammad Abdullah

review: Came here 2 times in a row for an evening with the family. Had some food - best Beef Carpaccio I have ever had in my life (this is considering I have been to Italy 60+ times and always order it as an appetizer) ‚Ä¶
name: Lydrin

review: Club at the top of Intercontinental Hotel Kiev with loud thumping music, a dark cool vibe, and good food.
name: Kenny Wyatt

review: dj made a smooth mix, cocktails were nice. didn't like the food so much. too salty, flat taste s
name: Alisa Heus

review: Great views but expect standard European prices for the drinks. Pity that they closed off half the roof terrace as well so could not get the all round views of the city. It was also quiet for a Saturday night - would have stayed longer if it was more lively. BTW they now do have seating on the terrace.
name: Wing Pang

review: Staff can be over efficient. The white wines list needs improvement. Dont't bring your own cigars, they want extra Greta venue and try the seafood menue - excellent!
name: Vernon Wilkes

review: Absolutely One of the best Bars in Kiev, It's expensive as it is at Intercontinental Hotel, it is very quiet place except at weekend.
name: Mohamed Shawly

review: Loved the location. Good cocktails although they are not cheap in terms of local prices. Great spot if you want a bit of a view. Higjly recommend it.
name: Jack Campbell

review: Amazing views of the city. The hookah is also one of the best in the city. Highly recommend this place for a date or a group of friends. Do note that prices are higher as compared to other places
name: Sidhant Sharma

review: Very smart with a huge selection of cocktails and a great view
name: David Alcindor

review: Amazing view and nice music. But cocktails are horrible and food is bad.
name: Achi Avaliani

review: Very beautiful view of kiev , prices is more or less of nightclub and it worth it. , if you want to impress a girl on first date thats the place to be.
name: stas spivak

review: Great spot to have a drink and a chat. The service was great, the food is good and the views are spectacular. I was there for an event and I would recommend it for this.
name: Azzaozz

review:
Best bar I know.
Cocktails are pieces of art not just drinks.
Service is perfect and the location speaks for itself.....
Absolut perfection  in any possible way!
name: Felix Schimke

review: Specify exactly what you want! Paid around 9‚Ç¨ for a small bottle of water (0.33ml) which is crazy for the Ukraine (for that amount you can get a dinner with 3 courses and drinks).
name: Julian Lindinger

review: Awesome atmosphere and amazing food. One of my favorite places to just hang out in Kiev.
name: Andy Martin

review: Good view, good vibe, not many people at the evening.
name: No Mad

review: Very kind people are working here, 5 star interior design, hookah place is separated from none smoking place, comfortable, good lighting, amazing view , One of the best places in kiev,
name: M

review: Great service and excellent cocktails with views to match. More on the expensive side but definitely worth a visit.
name: Adam Farrey

review: One of my all time favourites, great cocktails and hookah. Amazing venue give it a try.
name: Jan van York

review: Great views, a bit pricey, but great place, nice cocktails, good for summer time.
name: Wes P. Davison

review: Really good service with some delicious sushi, sashimi and maki to accompany the glorious views and tasteful cocktails.
name: Adnan Hussain

review: Good view, but mostly Asian food. But it is possible to order from the Ukrainian restaurant menu.
name: Stefan Kastler

review: Great food and excellent cocktails, just too noisy for a social night out.
name: Jason Cunnyngham

review: At these prices, the service, drinks & food better be excellent... Fortunately they are. Will visit again.
name: Werner van Alphen

review: Fancy place, good food, amazing view and service. Definitely will come back.
name: Hadar Shoval

review: Amazing view and great lounge offering tasty drinks.
name: Fredrik Westerlund

review: Best place in kyive best view best staff I love it
name: Ahmed Alsalti

review: Great views and drinks. Had a lovely time there.
name: Adam Preston

review: Good interior, good dishes...nice place in every way .... especially with friends
name: Ina Vintro

review: TOTALLY dead on a Wednesday night. I imagine Monday and Tuesday would be similar. Looks nice inside though.
name: Scott Plooster

review: Great sushi, great view, but comes at a high price tag
name: Fadi ElBaz

review: The bar and staff is brilliant. The music Nd food is fascinating
name: Mohammad AlNassir AlShammari

review: Great place. Has it all, view,food,drinks,live music
